name: Varia: Under the Starlight
description:
A long time ago, two beings, a father and a mother, had decided to become as statues,  and their hypothetical will carried out by their entourage.

A young man who called himself hero Haroldin rose in challenge of them and their followers. His own entourage supported him at any cost.

Years had past, and another adventurer arose from the same hamlet as the so-called hero Haroldin.

Will she become a hero, or another villain?

Game created for the Indie Game Making Contest 2018, still a prototype as of now.
